Class ExceptionProcessingInterceptor<E extends Exception>

java.lang.Object

      com.googlecode.catchexception.internal.ExceptionProcessingInterceptor<E>
Type Parameters:
E - The type of the exception that shall be caught and (optionally) verified
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.mockito.cglib.proxy.Callback, org.mockito.cglib.proxy.MethodInterceptor
public class ExceptionProcessingInterceptor<E extends Exception>
extends AbstractExceptionProcessingInvocationHandler<E>
implements org.mockito.cglib.proxy.MethodInterceptor

This AbstractExceptionProcessingInvocationHandler implements MethodInterceptor for Mockito's cglib variant.
